WorkItem.Description:
The HtmlAttribute.Name returns the _name as lower case.  I had a problem when converting SharePoint generated html as the attributes were loosing there case sensitivity.  I believe specifically it had to do with the <ie:menuitem> tags where the attributes like "onMenuClick" were being converted to "onmenuclick".
 
In any case, I simply removed the "return _name.ToLower();" and replaced it with "return _name;".
 
I'm not sure if this effects the HtmlAgilityPack elsewhere, but so far it is working for me.
 
Version: 1.4.0 Stable

Comments.Message: I have the same problem. Thank you for figuring it out.
